EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_SG_Big Data Roadshow_Q116.04 Reminder Email_0223
EmailTemplate.subject: Kind Reminder - Pivotal Big Data Event (26 Feb 2016 @ Suntec City Guildhouse)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Big Data Seminar!
We would like to remind you that you have registered for Pivotal Big Data workshop below:
Event Details
Date: 26 February 2016, Friday
Time: 8:30am - 2:00pm
Location: The Guild, Suntec City Guildhouse, 3 Temasek Boulevard (Tower 5) #02- 401/402 Suntec City Mall, Singapore 038983
Please feel free to contact us at jtan@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jtan@pivotal.io]]> if you have any questions. {{my.Save the date:default=edit me}}
